dcterms:description: MNIST dataset is handwritten images (28Ã—28) with digital numbers ranging from 0 to 9. The training set has a total of 60,000 images, with 54,000 images used for training and the rest for validation.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: CIFAR10 dataset consists of 10 classes of images, each containing 6,000 images. The dataset is commonly used for image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:description: SVHN (Street View House Numbers) dataset contains images of house numbers collected from Google Street View. It is used for multi-digit recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: SVHN
